title: 1910 H801-7 Old Mill Cabinet Charlotte cards (want list)
author: BrettHoneycutt

posts.post_title: 1910 H801-7 Old Mill Cabinet Charlotte cards (want list)
posts.post_content:
I am trying to find the 2 Charlotte cards from the 1910 H801-7 Old Mill Cabinet set. 

(I grew up in Charlotte attending minor league games and collect Charlotte minor league baseball memorabilia, especially cards).

Willing to accept any condition. 

1910 H801-7 Old Mill Cabinet Charlotte Checklist

Brazille (Brazell) – Charlotte
Cross – Charlotte


Thank you,

Brett
(brettrhoneycutt@hotmail.com)
